Operation 'getFlightChoicePredict' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. The current summary is vague and the description is completely missing. The operation's purpose is unclear for AI agents - it's not evident whether this predicts user choice, ranks offers, or performs some other analysis. Added context about: (1) what the operation predicts (user selection likelihood), (2) expected input format (FlightOffersSearchReply with multiple offers), (3) expected output (prediction scores/rankings), (4) factors considered in prediction (price, duration, airline, travel class), and (5) input requirements. This enables AI agents to understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_summary: Predict the choice of flight offers.
data.summary_suggestion: Predict most likely flight offer selection
data.description_suggestion: Predicts which flight offer from a search result set is most likely to be selected by the user. Accepts a FlightOffersSearchReply containing multiple flight offers and returns prediction scores or rankings indicating the probability of each offer being chosen. This operation helps identify user preferences based on flight characteristics such as price, duration, airline, and travel class. Requires a valid flight search result as input.
